alert.note: Alert for George; Greene; Perry; Stone (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 18 at 9:23AM CDT until March 18 at 10:15AM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western George County in southeastern Mississippi... Southern Perry County in southeastern Mississippi... Southwestern Greene County in southeastern Mississippi... Stone County in southeastern Mississippi... * Until 1015 AM CDT. * At 922 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 5 miles southeast of Poplarville, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Wiggins and Perkinston. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 AM CDT for southeastern Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 AM CDT for southeastern Mississippi.
